channel.title: Spotlight

channel.title: Donnie Brasco
channel.desc: While investigating a New York Mafia family from within, an FBI agent faces a moral quandary as he grows close to the organisation's feared hitman.

channel.title: Awakenings
channel.desc: When Dr Malcolm Sayer discovers a cure for an epidemic, numerous catatonic patients get a second chance to live. However, the cure eventually leads to more complications.

channel.title: Backstabbing for Beginners
channel.desc: Michael, a young United Nations employee, is shocked when he discovers a scandalous global conspiracy involving the murder of his predecessor.

channel.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
channel.desc: An American baseball player Moe Berg is drafted as a spy to help stop Werner Heisenberg, a theoretical physicist, from making an atomic bomb for the Nazis.

channel.title: Vertigo
channel.desc: Scottie Ferguson, a former police officer from San Francisco suffering from acrophobia, is hired by an old friend to investigate the peculiar behaviour of his beautiful wife, Madeleine.

channel.title: Who Am I
channel.desc: A lonely hacker who dreams of being a superhero becomes part of a cyber group. However, his life turns upside down when the group becomes involved in causing a threat to national security.

channel.title: Hansan
channel.desc: Korean admiral Yi Sun-sin and his fleet battle against the attack of the Japanese navy and achieve an epic win through a secret weapon.

channel.title: Once in the Desert
channel.desc: After Palmyra, an ancient city in Syria, is liberated from terrorists, a group of Russian soldiers is instructed to remove the mines left in the city.

channel.title: Wrong Place
channel.desc: Jake, the son of the notorious drug dealer Virgil, goes after former policeman Frank's daughter to stop him from testifying against his father. However, an unexpected surprise awaits him.
